messages.content: search perplexity for croissant recipes for 2 different types of flour

I found croissant recipes using multiple flour types including all-purpose + bread flour combinations. Here's a detailed recipe using 500g bread flour, 250g all-purpose flour, 125g butter, 10g salt, 12g sugar, 8g fresh yeast, and 400ml milk.
i'd like to explore making these recipes at the same time

Great! Making multiple croissant variations simultaneously is excellent for comparing textures and flavors. We can batch the dough preparations and coordinate the timing for lamination and proofing stages.
